item.title: 巴黎奥运意外提振欧元区经济
item.description: 巴黎奥运会出人意料地推动了欧元区经济的增长，使私营部门的增长速度达到三个月来的最快水平。【原文：The euro-area economy got an unexpectedly strong boost from the Paris Olympics, which propelled private-sector growth to the fastest pace in three months.】

item.title: 亿万富翁阿达尼将整顿家族办公室，聘请审计师和首席执行官加强监督
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）计划任命一家全球顶级公司的审计师，并为其家族办公室聘请一名首席执行官，以实现通常与上市公司相关的信息披露水平。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani plans to appoint auditors from a top global firm and hire a chief executive officer for his family offices to bring a level of disclosure often associated with listed companies, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 基金以超额的乌克兰债券回报率击败 99% 的同行
item.description: 一家专注于购买垃圾债券的基金通过大量购买乌克兰企业的债务，几乎击败了所有竞争对手。【原文：A fund focused on buying junk bonds has crushed just about all of its competitors by loading up on debt from corporations in Ukraine.】

item.title: 香港航空在长途航线上重新启用二手波音 787 飞机
item.description: 香港航空有限公司（Hong Kong Airlines Ltd.）正在寻求增加二手波音公司 787 Dreamliner 喷气式飞机，以重振其长途飞行雄心。【原文：Hong Kong Airlines Ltd. is looking to add second-hand Boeing Co. 787 Dreamliner jets in an effort to revive its long-haul ambitions after its previous ill-fated intercontinental push nearly sunk the company.】

item.title: 印度公司在 2024 年实现翻番后跃居全球金融科技股榜首
item.description: PB 金融科技有限公司（PB Fintech Ltd.）股价大涨，使这只印度股票成为今年全球主要金融科技公司中表现最好的股票，因为在央行打压之后，无担保贷款出现了绿芽。【原文：A surge in PB Fintech Ltd. has turned the Indian stock into the world’s best-performer this year among major financial technology firms as green shoots emerge in unsecured lending after a central bank crackdown.】

item.title: 挪威经济连续三个季度实现增长
item.description: 由于购买力的恢复促进了消费，疲软的克朗支撑了出口，挪威经济连续第三个季度实现扩张。【原文：The Norwegian economy recorded a third consecutive quarter of expansion as a recovery in purchasing power bolsters consumption and a weak krone underpins exports.】

item.title: 卢比屡创新低掩盖了其贸易权重过高的价值
item.description: 7月份，印度卢比对其主要贸易伙伴的汇率升至六年多来的最高点，尽管该货币对美元的汇率创下了历史新低。【原文：A gauge showing the Indian rupee’s value against its key trading partners rose to the highest in more than six years in July, even as the currency hit a new lifetime low against the dollar.】

item.title: 欧元涨势有可能被杰罗姆-鲍威尔戛然而止
item.description: 欧元 8 月份涨势不减，兑美元汇率周三创下一年新高，但美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周五的谨慎基调可能会扭转这一势头。【原文：The euro’s August gains have been relentless, taking it to a one year high against the dollar on Wednesday, but a cautious tone from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Friday could turn that momentum around.】

item.title: 印度经济活动略有下滑，最新采购经理人指数显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，由于制造业新订单增长放缓，印度8月份的经济活动略有下滑。【原文：India’s economic activity slipped slightly in August as new order growth for the manufacturing sector slowed, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑接近一年来最高水平
item.description: 2024 年 8 月 20 日星期二，在英国伦敦，游客在观景点俯瞰金丝雀码头金融、商业和购物区。在经历了欺诈最严重的一个夏天之后，数百家金融公司正在努力遵守英国的一项新制度，该制度旨在 10 月 7 日截止日期之前遏制在线支付欺诈。摄影师：克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Visitors at a viewing spot overlooking the Canary Wharf financial, business and shopping district in London, UK, on Tuesday, Aug. 20, 2024. Hundreds of financial firms are struggling to comply with a new UK regime designed to rein in online payment scams before an Oct. 7 deadline after one of the worst summers for fraud. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 全球电动汽车销售放缓，VinFast 推迟在泰国开设经销商
item.description: 在东南亚第二大经济体乘用车销售普遍放缓的情况下，越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast Auto Ltd. 将推迟在泰国开设经销网络。【原文：Vietnamese electric-vehicle maker VinFast Auto Ltd. is postponing the opening of its Thailand dealership network amid a broad slowdown in passenger car sales in Southeast Asia’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 巨灾索赔减少，瑞士再保险公司利润超出预期
item.description: 瑞士再保险公司（Swiss Re AG）上半年的净收入超出预期，因为该再保险公司避免了因自然灾害造成的更高索赔，而自然灾害对整个保险业造成了影响。【原文：Swiss Re AG’s first-half net income beat estimates, as the re-insurer avoided higher claims from natural catastrophes that have impacted the broader insurance industry.】

item.title: 如果美联储放宽政策，非洲落后的高收益企业将成为首选
item.description: 在美国联邦储备委员会预计于 9 月降息之前，投资者正盯着尼日利亚、加蓬和肯尼亚的高收益外币债券，认为其中一些债务证券定价错误，有进一步反弹的空间。【原文：Investors are eyeing high-yield foreign currency bonds from Nigeria, Gabon, and Kenya ahead of an anticipated US Federal Reserve rate cut in September, seeing some of these debt securities as being mispriced and having scope to rally further.】

item.title: 鲍威尔真的能在圣诞节前将 1%的减税带回家吗？
item.description:
美联储的宽松 运动显然始于9月份，但在三次会议上削减整整一个百分点将需要 至少一次削减50个基点。这似乎太过分了。【原文：

The Fed’s easing campaign clearly starts in September, but a full percentage point in three meetings would require at least one of 50 basis points. That seems a cut too far.

】

item.title: 谈判失败，加拿大铁路公司锁闭工人，贸易受阻
item.description: 加拿大两条最大的铁路（占全国铁路网的近 80%）在与工会谈判失败后于周四早些时候关闭，立即阻断了每天运输约 10 亿加元（约合 7.4 亿美元）贸易的北美供应链动脉。【原文：Canada’s two biggest railways, accounting for almost 80% of the national network, shut down early Thursday after talks with a union failed, immediately blocking arteries of North American supply chains that carry about C$1 billion ($740 million) per day in trade.】

item.title: 香港加密货币交易所在获得正式牌照方面面临挑战
item.description: 香港在推动建立数字资产中心的过程中面临着越来越大的困难，因为在早些时候获得初步批准后，11 家加密货币交易所是否都能获得正式牌照还存在不确定性。【原文：Hong Kong’s push for a digital-asset hub faces growing pains amid uncertainty over whether 11 crypto exchanges will all achieve full licenses after earlier receiving initial approvals.】

item.title: 挪威进入维修季节，欧洲天然气面临紧缺时期
item.description: 挪威庞大的天然气工业即将开始一年一度的大规模维护工作，这对整个欧洲大陆来说都是一个关键时刻。【原文：Norway’s vast natural gas industry is about to embark on its annual heavy maintenance spree at a crucial time for the wider continent.】

item.title: 大和计划进军澳大利亚农场贷款和房地产领域
item.description: 大和证券集团公司（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc. is eyeing Australia for its first expansion into the agricultural sector abroad, part of a wider push to boost lending and direct investment in the country’s real estate and renewable energy sectors.】

item.title: 中国公布打压债券措施细节，为多头带来些许安慰
item.description: 中国监管机构的一位高级官员表示，中国政府将继续打击较长期限债券的投机性交易，但他同时表示，中国官员并不像某些人猜测的那样试图控制收益率。【原文：A senior official at a Chinese regulatory body said Beijing will keep cracking down on speculative trading in longer-dated bonds, though suggested officials are not seeking to control yields as some suspected.】

item.title: Binance 裁员 1000 人，合规支出突破 2 亿美元
item.description: Binance Holdings Ltd. 今年将招聘 1000 名员工，其中许多人将专门负责合规工作，因为这家加密货币交易所每年为满足监管要求（包括美国根据认罪协议进行的监管）而支出的费用高达 2 亿美元。【原文：Binance Holdings Ltd. is hiring 1,000 people this year with many earmarked for compliance roles as the crypto exchange’s annual spending to meet regulatory requirements, including US oversight under a plea deal, tops $200 million.】

item.title: 中国银行成为疯狂追逐收益率的意外赢家
item.description: 随着中国经济的挣扎和房地产危机的恶化，这里可以说是股票投资者最不愿意去的地方之一。【原文：It’s arguably one of the last places you’d expect stock investors to turn as China’s economy struggles and its real estate crisis worsens.】

item.title: 中国股市第三年创下退市纪录
item.description: 受过去十年首次公开募股（IPO）数量激增以及为淘汰弱小公司而出台的更严格规定的推动，中国股市将连续第三年创下退市纪录。【原文：China’s stock markets are set for a third straight year of record delistings driven by the jump in IPOs over the past decade and tighter rules introduced to weed out weaker members.】

item.title: 低税是印度的诱惑，绿色债务错失国家债券热潮
item.description: 印度正在做出新的努力，以激发人们对其绿色债券的兴趣，因为该类别债券错失了外国资金流入当地主权债券的洪流。【原文：India is making new efforts to ignite interest in its green debt as the category misses out on a torrent of foreign flows into local sovereign bonds.】

item.title: 马来西亚债券将从国债反弹中获得亚洲新兴市场最大收益
item.description: 新兴亚洲债券对国债的敏感度正在向 2024 年的峰值回升，马来西亚的债务将成为最大的受益者。【原文：The sensitivity of emerging Asian bonds to Treasuries is climbing back toward its 2024 peak, with Malaysia’s debt set to be the biggest beneficiary.】

item.title: 澳大利亚股市或将延续2015年以来最长连胜势头
item.description: 澳大利亚股市创下近九年来最长连胜纪录，随着基准指数逼近历史新高，涨势似乎有望继续。【原文：Australian stocks are on their longest winning streak in almost nine years, and the rally appears poised to continue as the benchmark flirts with fresh record high levels.】

item.title: Wamco 长期以来的债券大王被推到了他所回避的聚光灯下
item.description: 三十年来，肯-李奇一直是另一位邦德之王，一位沉默寡言的邦德之王。【原文：For three decades, Ken Leech was the other Bond King, the quiet one.】

item.title: 感染模式复杂多样，麻疹病毒风险增加
item.description: 当疾病检测人员赶赴非洲中部平息如雨后春笋般蔓延的麻风腮疫情时，他们发现了一种复杂的马赛克感染模式，其中涉及不同的病毒株和大相径庭的感染途径。【原文：As disease detectives rush to central Africa to quell a mushrooming mpox contagion, they’re finding a complex mosaic of infection patterns involving different viral strains and vastly different routes of infection.】
